categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic space stations

nodes.text: Alliance Station I was a space station in the Karthakk system used by the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Alliance Station I was a space station in Jump to Lightspeed, the 2004 expansion pack for the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
